players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I am very concerned that Bob was killed last night. Since there is only one mafioso, we must be vigilant. Charlie, Alice, what are your thoughts on who might be suspicious so far?"
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. Diana, we need to vote him out."
Charlie: "That accusation from Alice is suspiciously quick and convenient. Diana, why are you so quick to trust Alice without more evidence?"
Diana: "I understand Charlie's point, but Alice's claim can't be ignored since she said she investigated him. Charlie, can you provide any evidence or reasoning to prove your innocence?"
Charlie: "Accusing me without proof only benefits the real mafioso. Alice, what method did you use to investigate? If you’re lying, that makes you the suspicious one."
You: "I investigated Charlie and confirmed he is mafioso. He's trying to deflect instead of providing any counter-evidence. Diana, trust me - we must vote Charlie out now."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
